website_summaries.verdict: Unparalleled comfort in a minimalist shoe best describes the Taos Dandy. Its metatarsal, arch, and heel support make it an exceptional pair. Matched with an easy on and off wear, it is certainly a dandy shoe that provides all the needed convenience for all age ranges. These sneakers are offered at an affordable price of $90.
pros: An overwhelming amount of testers find the arch and metatarsal support very comfortable to the feet, especially those who are older and those who are suffering from issues like plantar fasciitis, Morton's neuroma, and flat feet
Several of those who purchased the sneaker like the slip-on design as it makes wearing convenient and fast
One mentions that these are worthy of the investment
According to one wearer, the shoe is very easy to clean
Even the white border only needs wiping
A couple of users described the Dandy as lightweight and well-constructed
Because the shoe is already comfortable as it is, there is no need for inserts
First-time purchasers of Taos footwear say that this will not be the last
More than its comfort, several reviewers highly appreciate that it also comes in a stylish and versatile silhouette
One likes the narrow style of the Taos Dandy as it exudes a feminine look
cons: Many of the commenters experience issues with the fit of the shoe
It fits tightly near the toes but loose on the heel
One says that the canvas upper makes her feet unusually warm
Few of the testers noted that the sole starts to separate from the sneaker after only a short time of wear
A small number of users find the canvas upper stiff and causes pain in the area where the textile creases

customer_reviews.title: Good for your feet, but not built to last :(
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and fit of the shoe. I tend to have a lot of issues with my feet but these are super supportive! My only beef with these shoes is after just 3 months of wear the soles of the shoes have started to peel away from the rest of the shoe. $80 bucks is a lot of money to spend on a canvas sneaker just to have them start falling a part after 3 months. It's super disappointing too since they are so good to my feet! I glued part of the sole back down, but more of the sole is peeling away
customer_reviews.author: vjb68

customer_reviews.title: I was pretty happy with these shoes--nice canvas
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty happy with these shoes--nice canvas, nice color, cool style--but literally only the second time I've worn them I noticed the sole is coming unglued so I know that will only get worse. For the price, they should not be coming unglued already ,
customer_reviews.author: Cat Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Too big and not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I really, really love the way my Taos feel on my foot. I am giving a 2 star because this shoe is 1. Ridiculously expensive for a slip on man looking tennis shoe 2. It arrived and the white rubber portion has a blackish tinge all over, don't know if this is an error or someone's return 3. The Taos fit depends on the shoe, in the boot I have an 8.5, in the lace up tennis shoe I have 9.5, in this I ordered 9.5 and it's too large. Arrggh.
customer_reviews.author: wkreader

customer_reviews.title: My new go to brand of shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have foot problems and need to wear GOOD shoes even in the house. These are now my house shoes. It was stated to buy 1/2 size larger than you usually wear. I did and they are perfect. I have a wide foot and they didn't offer a wide size but they fit fine. I couldn't ask for better support for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Trouble with sizing.
customer_reviews.text: I have an awkward foot: slim but also have double ingrown toenails. I have ordered this show in my true size 7 and I could feel my big toe slightly. But enough so that I ordered a 7.5. The 7.5 was too large and my heel kept popping out on every step. Not sure what to do because I want these shoes ..... the foot bed support, especially the metatarsal support is outrageously great! I have not felt so much relief on this part of my foot in some time. I will keep working on the sizing for me. Shoes are worth the money though. Tough canvas material and the bottom is not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: start to smell bad
customer_reviews.text: The style and comfort are there, but I couldn't wear these after a few months because they started to smell bad, even though I haven't worn them in the rain and none of my other shoes which are older smell bad. Don't know what the problem is, but I wouldn't buy them again given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S

customer_reviews.title: the length felt fine and the toe box was wide enough
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews said to order a half a size up and I found that to be true. So, the length felt fine and the toe box was wide enough. But, the heel was really wide so it slipped, the insole was too far forward and the shoe was somehow unflattering, though the shoe itself is cute. It's lighter and flatter than other shoes made in the same style. I love the Taos designs and have tried two this far, but neither has fit unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Samurai

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe with good arch support
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for a long time to find a casual summer shoe like this that has good arch support. This definitely does! I am often on my feet all day long and these are super comfortable. They are great for a casual but professional style. I wish they weren't so pricey but at the end of a long day, my feet and legs thank me for plunking down some extra dough to keep them comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Swim

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size, but I got huge blisters on my heels.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these only once and they gave me huge blisters!!! Other than that, they felt comfortable and true to fit. I'm going to try and wear them a little each day to wear them in, maybe that will help. I really want them to work. I need them for work.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Manning-Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I have 3 other Taos shoes and sandals
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I have 3 other Taos shoes and sandals, and the fit is immediately comfortable and supportive. These shoes have the same comfortable and supportive insole, however the rubber outer sole has a seam that rubs on the toes on the inside, especially the little toe. I have only tried it on for a few minutes twice, but am concerned with the rubbing and potential blistering due to the seam on my toe. I wondered if there might be any fix??? I would love to wear these on my vacation next week, but the rubbing of the seam is too uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Yeagley

customer_reviews.title: Good support and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love the arch support, just as other Taos shoes. The style is very flattering. The mid shoe near the gores is a little tight, but hopefully will stretch out over time. The back of the heel rubs a bit against my ankle if I don’t wear socks high enough to cover, but that seems to have gotten better over wearing it for two weeks. Overall a good pair of shoes I can wear to semi casual workplace and comfortably walk all day.
customer_reviews.author: MBur

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe but not for prolonged walking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe because it was on sale. It's cute and it fits fine. I have a high arch and it has good arch support. My only complaint is that it could have more padding in the foot bed. It's fine for going out to dinner or a movie....but isn't super comfortable for prolonged walking or standing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Small and tight for size
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very cute and well made. I have other shoes by this brand that are very nice, but I purchased a 7.5 in this shoe and it was so tight and small it was painful. I generally wear a 7 to 7.5. I had hoped to exchange for a bigger size, but exchange was not available. I had to simply return the shoes. I was required to pay shipping for the return and that was disappointing and furtherly irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size are they knock-offs
customer_reviews.text: They are NOT true to size. Or they could be knock-offs. I’m always a 7-7.5 narrow. The 7.5 are too small!! They are cute shoes but I would recommend sizing up 1 whole size.
customer_reviews.author: Holly E

customer_reviews.title: I love the great construction and comfortable fit of Taos shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the great construction and comfortable fit of Taos shoes. They are a little pricey but last a long time. I wanted a khaki-colored shoe for summer and love this slip-on style. I did order a half-size up after reading other reviews and am glad I did. They are still a bit tight but I don't think a full size up would have worked for me, so I just wear thin socks. So far they've been very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Borden

customer_reviews.title: Amazing arch support
customer_reviews.text: I wear between a 6 and 6.5, so based on reviews, I ordered the 6.5. Still way too narrow, but I think a 7 would have been too large (my heels were already slipping a bit). I have never considered my feet particularly wide, so the narrowness of this shoe was quite surprising. Amazing arch support, though and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia McRae

customer_reviews.title: Snug toe box
customer_reviews.text: These may work in a 1/2 size up from my usual Taos size, but the cut of the toe box simply doesn't work for my feet in my regular size. They felt fine initially around the house--and even at the end of the day my arches felt amazing--but one of my big toes developed a major bruise overnight after one wear, so now I'm just using the insoles in other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: HCL

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: My aunt (physical therapist) suggested this brand. I purchased specifically for travelling in Europe. Needed cute and comfortable...tennis shoes don't always fit the cute category. They were just what I needed. Just a tip though, they do fit just a bit small, but once broken in they fit great. They are pricey but so worth it! and I know will last me a while.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Keely

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable slip on
customer_reviews.text: These shoes from Taos footwear are easy to slip on and off. They worked well on our recent cruise for trips up to the sun deck or to the buffet line. I was able to wear them with thin socks or no socks. I recommend them. They're also fairly attractive. I like the color I selected.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Paid full price for Taos brand but pretty sure I received a knockoff brand
customer_reviews.text: Paid full price for Taos brand but pretty sure I received a knockoff brand. Came in generic box and no Taos brand info to be found. The fit is different and inside the shoe the lining is missing....not as comfortable! I also ordered blue pair which came in Taos box and is great quality that I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best arch support
customer_reviews.text: These shoes saved my life, and I use them now for school, but they are the best travel shoes that you could have mainly because they are slip on slip off and have the best former to your foot arch support. I wore these all over japan and LA and they are a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Norah Fanuzzi

customer_reviews.title: If you have narrow feet,  don't order these.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these shoes. Super cute, but too wide in the heel for me (I wear a narrow, but thought I would try these. ) Also, the insole was harder than what I like.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but quirky
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is just what other reviewers have said: good quality, runs small, very substantial arch support. This is great for me because I have high arches. If you don't have an arch anymore, you won't like this shoe. I wear a 9 in other Taos shoes. I ordered a 9.5 in this shoe and it just barely fits. Meets my needs but if you need more room in the toe box consider ordering a full size up.
customer_reviews.author: Jen L.

customer_reviews.title: High arch, loose heel
customer_reviews.text: I found the arch was higher than other taos shoes I've worn. The heel was loose.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I’ve ever found. Removable sole if you want to use your own orthotics. I’ve been wearing them all the time. This was a replacement pair! Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie KO

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could wear these every day (a bit too casual for work). Terrific arch support and really cute. I'm a "small" size 9, so these were perfect for me. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: They run small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them a half size larger than I wear and they are still too snug. I think if I found the right size they would be super comfortable and I would love them.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Melo

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes helped me mend from Planters fasciitis. These have great arch support. I ended up buying two pair. I took the advice of other reviewer’s and ordered a half a size larger and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Leibro4u

customer_reviews.title: Comfy after breaking in
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 9, which is usually big enough. Toes were a bit cramped. Sent size 9 back, and ordered a size 9 1/2. That was a good fit. The shoes were a bit stiff, but softened after wearing them a few times. I have a high arch, but it still took awhile to get used to the inserts. Plan to ear them while touring San Francisco.
customer_reviews.author: Pot O Gold

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality
customer_reviews.text: ★ from Roseanne Riedel on May 18, 2019 Felt like a totally different shoe. Not the same quality (inner and outer sole, and no pull up tab) as the same exact design and size purchased in a local shoe store. In addition, the shoes were not packaged like a “new” pair.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne Riedel

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable! I have plantar fasciitis on one foot and Norton neuroma on the other foot. They provide me relief for both.. they do run small and since I'm a fan of Taos, I know to order size up.
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the next size up per some people's recommendation and they were too large. Even though they slipped off my heel when I walked, I thought they were uncomfortable at the heel too. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great arch supports
customer_reviews.text: Love Taos shoes- need the arch support. Super trendy and cute but still effective for my plantar fasciitis. Great to slip on and go!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard on the inside under the cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, but I took the cushioning out to wash them and underneath is cardboard. Too expensive to be so cheap made. You cannnot wash them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sneaks ever
customer_reviews.text: I now own 5 pair of these sneakers in various colors. They are incredibly comfortable and great for pain in my heel. They’re my favorite shoes
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable, and classy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Taos shoes! So very comfortable, comes in a variety of colors (I bought the khaki wash canvas) and they look great with whatever you have on! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: C. DeLoach

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Taos is one of my favorite brands of shoes and these do not disappoint. The arch is great and I can wear them for lengths of time with them hurting my arch and heal. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy H. Mundy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This my 3rd pair of Taos shoes. I love the arch support and comfort. I typically wear a size 9 shoe but in this brand I order 9 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: P Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these shoes. I have a narrow foot so it is hard to find shoes that fit. With socks, they are prefect.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Run very small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 1/2 size bigger and they still didn’t fit. They were also not in perfectly new condition when they arrived. Would not order Taos shoes again without trying them on.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Imgram

customer_reviews.title: Great support and Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: Loved these loafers-I have 3 different colors. They are so comfortable, with good arch support and cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Nutmeg

customer_reviews.title: nice shoe but...
customer_reviews.text: Returned because these rubbed the back of my heel, I have several pair of the Taos Star sneakers and they are great fitting. Guess the slip ones don't fit the same. They were very cute, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for casual on your feet days !
customer_reviews.text: Great right out of the box , comfy with it without socks . All day wear good .
customer_reviews.author: Grammashe

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Had to order 1/2 size larger but they have been a life saver. Supportive and cute! Helped my back pain
customer_reviews.author: for the love of goats

customer_reviews.title: Canvas is stiff
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes but the canvas on top is stiff and hurts the top of my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes and the Taos brand
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and the Taos brand! I need some arch support and can now wear slip-ons that are even cuter than shoes without the support.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great Casual Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Love the blue splash color -- goes with everything casual. They do run a half size small. I normally wear a 9, and the 9.5 is perfect with no-show socks.
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Too tight for a size 7M
customer_reviews.text: Too tight in my regular size 7M. Like the look though! I have worn it a couple of times and it has not stretched yet. I wish they had it in a wide.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Taos Gray slip on's
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! These shoes are both comfortable, and stylish. I have a pair that I ordered 1/2 size larger and one pair that is 1 whole size larger. Both fit but, I do find the 1 size up a bit more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cave

customer_reviews.title: They were cute, but way too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I own a size 8 of a different Taos shoe, but the one I ordered was too narrow. I had to send it back and they didn't have the next size up available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoe
customer_reviews.text: Wore them all day long on first wear, and my feet did not hurt anywhere. My first pair of Taos, but won't be my last.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Spring in to spring!
customer_reviews.text: Have not had any spring weather yet but will use a lot when it arrives! Live Taos shoes, they are the best
customer_reviews.author: ella

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Slip-On Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are comfortable slip-on shoes. They have nice arch support as well. I already bought a different color too.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: High arch
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so cute, but the arch is too high for my flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey H.

customer_reviews.title: Each shoe had different fit.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! I really wanted these shoes.The sizing was all messed up.The right shoe was bigger and wider than the left.Lace pattern did not match up with the other shoe Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen A Harringtom

customer_reviews.title: Great vacation shoe
customer_reviews.text: The arch support is perfect for me. This is my 4th pair of Taos. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: pmmdfm

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to like these, but I took everyones advice and ordered half a size up. They are way too wide, and the padding on the sides looks really bulky. I like the Keds much better.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Stitching came loose at elastic the 1st time worn, took to local cobbler and paid 10.00 to have repaired. Other than that nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Well made shoe but very snug in my size and the high arch made it extremely uncomfortable. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered with ankle tendinitis and plantar fascistic for several years. I also have a narrow foot. Honestly, this is the first pair of shoes that I have been able to comfortably wear directly out of the box. I finally found a shoe that works!
customer_reviews.author: JudyS

customer_reviews.title: Sent back already!!
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a defective pair of blue denim shoes!! The white rubber trim around the shoes were stained in blue dye all over. Looks really bad, and I would be embarrassed to wear them. Sent back already. Defectively made. What happened to quality control?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: I generally wear a 81/2 to a 9. My other Taos shoes are size 9 but I'll need to reorder these in a 91/2 or maybe even a 10.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sim.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of shoes. Every since I have found Taos footwear my foot hasn't hurt. Great brand.
customer_reviews.author: MMK

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: A complete disappointment. Cushioning does not run the full length of the shoe. Fit was correct size but uncomfortable. Not at all worth the price. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Atte

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for walking and has a very good arch support
customer_reviews.author: bonnieethel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, cute and comfortable. Ordered a 1/2 size up based on reviews. Look forward to wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Joan D.

customer_reviews.title: Slip into comfort
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! So comfy, I can wear without my orthotics and still walk all day. The support is great, and they slip in easily.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria P.

customer_reviews.title: Sole may fall off
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe but for some reason the sole rubber was already falling off in under one month. It was flapping as I walked and I only wore them for 4 weeks! I am hoping to get them replaced by the seller or an exchange for my old pair. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Judith M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Heel is a little shallow but shoes are comfortable for short
customer_reviews.text: Heel is a little shallow but shoes are comfortable for short walks
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Saved my feet
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis & have tried many inserts that haven’t helped. These shoes have saved my feet! I keep them by my bed & I can walk in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect and oh so comfortable for everyday wear. Cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Geege

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful arch support. Very cute I took the advice of others and bought 1/2 size larger. Fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: P. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but slips at the heel needed a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product,but slips at the heel needed a narrow, but they do not make. Shame!
customer_reviews.author: CAF - ME

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Product ran small need to go up a 1/2 size. After reading the reviews I will not reorder seems they come apart. I do a lot of walking at my job not paying $$ for something not lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute.
customer_reviews.text: Love the orthotic insole. Comfy and cute. I ordered a half size larger per the other comments and they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Beach girl

customer_reviews.title: very nice looking -- runs small
customer_reviews.text: The size I usually wear in this brand was too short. I re-ordered - a half size larger and I think it will be okay, and it still seems just a touch short, but another half size up would make it too big.
customer_reviews.author: jojobo

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: They looked cute and I was hoping to get Taos comfort but the fit was odd. Large and on the wide side.and I had already ordered down a half size.
customer_reviews.author: Lakeside

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Large and very stiff....looked comfortable but the footbed was uncomfortable and I felt I was stepping on a rock under my toes. These shoes must run large.
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have it
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe; ordered a second pair. Great arch support for all day wearing. Can't wait to see the next season of Taos.
customer_reviews.author: Not a big shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: No break in required- well made - took them in vacation and they were comfortable and washed well after hiking- very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Comfie
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and I got the washed blue which will look nice with my shorts this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart After Two Months
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this shoe and it would have had a 5 star rating if it weren't for the fact that the bottom is falling off. I bought these shoes in August for the start of the school year. I needed a shoe that was easy to put on, would go with anything and were comfortable.The arch support is wonderful, which is what a need when I am on my feet all day teaching. They only lasted for two months before they started to fall apart. Now they are just sitting in my closet. I am very dissappointed with how poorly they held up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taos
customer_reviews.text: I love the arc support. That’s the main reason I bought them! The color is great and goes with nearly everything. I may buy them again in multiple colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! The support in this shoe is amazing! A must have for anyone on their feet a lot. Perfect for teachers.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Manning

customer_reviews.title: They looked comfortable but when I tried them on were the most ...
customer_reviews.text: They looked comfortable but when I tried them on were the most uncomfortable shoes I’ve ever tried. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Got3boys

customer_reviews.title: Help with plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Have been suffering from plantar fasciitis for a year and tried many expensive shoes but none felt as good as these. I even have been wearing them in place of my Clark’s bedroom slippers.
customer_reviews.author: MARILYN WHITE

customer_reviews.title: They have excellent arch support
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of this style Taos I have had and I love the wonderful support they offer
customer_reviews.author: Singsusannah

customer_reviews.title: love these shoes - very comfortable right from start I ...
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes - very comfortable right from start I did buy 1/2 size larger after reading other reviews. Arch is perfect for my foot. I wish they were not so expensive so I could buy several pairs.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Toe box feels small at first but after one day of wear it is fine. Arch support and overall comfort is great
customer_reviews.author: D Star

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe, a bit tight
customer_reviews.text: Great support, but tight on my foot. Next time I will get a 1/2 size larger. I have to wear thin socks with them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pelton

customer_reviews.title: Thin sole
customer_reviews.text: This is the “Dandy” style and not the “RubberSoul” style that I was wanting. The Dandy doesn’t have a thicker bottom sole.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Star Howes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute & comfortable! I’m using them for both work and pleasure!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is wonderful! You can go shopping in it and never ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is wonderful! You can go shopping in it and never get tired.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like'd it, but needed a 10W instead of 11M, so it didn't work out...
customer_reviews.author: Christy Roberts

customer_reviews.title: These shoes run small. Order 1/2 size or size larger than you usually wear.
customer_reviews.text: Great arch support, great looking, but sized smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho reader

customer_reviews.title: order up 1/2 size
customer_reviews.text: I am a true 7 1/2 but had to return these and order a size 8, so definitely order up 1/2 size once I got the 8 they fit perfect and the arch support is great and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, have several pairs. I have high arches and they are very supportive for flat shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Good support.
customer_reviews.text: I got a half size bigger then normal and they fit just right. Good support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My shoes are brand spankin’ new
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! From the perfect fit, comfort and style, I could not be any happier!
customer_reviews.author: Lilac Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and loved the arch support but was slightly to wide in the toe area and uncomfortable.

product_meta.title: Taos womens Dandy
product_meta.description: Women's Taos, Dandy Sneaker. Let your casual style shine through with these cute sneakers!. Comfortable canvas upper Slip on styling for easy on and off Fabric lining Removable cushioned footbed for added comfort Manmade outsole. Heel Height of .50 inches
